theseView.valide: Versions validated by the PhD jury
theseView.showMoreAbstract: View the rest of the abstract
theseView.showLessAbstract: Display an extract from the abstract
theseView.embargo: This thesis is under embargo until
theseView.enTraitementEnd: . The diploma certificate is currently being processed by the degree granting institution.
theseView.modalContent:
Warning


The author of the thesis has not authorised its free distribution on the Internet.

In accordance with the national regulations in force, defined,
  • between 1st September 2006 and 1st September 2016, by the decrees of 7th August 2006 relating to doctoral training and relating to the procedures for filing, reporting, reproducing, distributing and conserving theses or works presented for defense with a view to a doctorate,
  • from 1st September 2016, by the decree of 25th May 2016 establishing the national framework for training and the procedures leading to the award of the national doctoral diploma, updated on 26th August 2022,

The thesis may only be distributed within the French university community. If you are a member of the aforementioned university community (students, teachers, researchers, staff), you can access the document by lo ging in with the login and password you normally use at your home institution.

As this thesis is a work of the mind, and as such it is protected by the French Intellectual Property Code. The file(s) you are about to download as a member of the French university community may not be used outside the framework set by the right to private copying(article L122-5, 2°, du CPI). Any plagiarism or counterfeiting, as well as any unlawful reproduction or distribution outside a private context without prior authorisation from the author, is strictly prohibited and may result in criminal penalties of up to 3 years' imprisonment and a fine of €300,000.
theseView.modalAgree: I have read the national regulations and the conditions for use of the thesis.

footer.texte: Lists all the French doctoral theses defended in France since 1985 as well as topics prepared in French Higher Education institutions along with people involved in French doctoral research. The database is constantly updated and upgraded.
footer.idRref: IdRef Identifiers database for Higher Education and Research
footer.tef: Encoding format for French electronic thesis
footer.logoAbesAlt: Go to the French Higher Education Bibliographic Agency website
footer.logoMesriAlt: Go to the French Ministry of Higher Education and Research website
footer.globalETD: Global ETD Search - Electronic theses worldwide
footer.apiGouv: Access the theses.fr APIs on the api.gouv.fr website
footer.idRef: Access IdRef, the database of identifiers and repositories used for French higher education and research
footer.accesSudoc: Access Sudoc, the collective catalog of French university and research libraries
footer.accesTEF: Access the AFNOR TEF recommendation, the format for describing French electronic doctoral theses
footer.accesGlobalETD: Access the Global ETD Search engine that references electronic theses worldwide
footer.accesDonnees: Access the Abes website for information on how theses.fr processes privacy policy
footer.accesCGU: Access the Abes website for the Terms of Use of the theses.fr website
footer.accesMention: Access the Abes website for the legal notices of theses.fr
footer.accesAccessibilite: Access the Abes website for information on the digital accessibility of the theses.fr website

meta.desc: Theses.fr is a search engine for French PhD theses, and provides access to doctoral theses that have been defended or are in progress.
meta.titre: Theses.fr, the search engine for French PhD theses
meta.descResult: Result of the search engine for French PhD theses, theses.fr provides access to doctoral theses that have been defended or are in progress. Thanks to its search engine and faceted navigation, the interface provides access to thesis data: title, doctor, disciplines, supervisors, institutions where the thesis was defended, doctoral schools, research partners and defense date.

Accès réservé aux membres de l’enseignem: Access restricted to French Higher Education institutions
Accès en bibliothèque à une copie sur mi: Copy on microfiche available in the Library
Accès en bibliothèque à une copie imprim: Printed copy available in the Library
Accès en ligne à la version incomplète: Online access to the incomplete version
Achat d'une impression à l'ANRT: Purchase of a print copy made by the ANRT
Accès en ligne à une version remaniée pa: Online access to a version edited by the author
Accès en bibliothèque à la version publi: Published version available in the Library
Cette thèse est confidentielle jusqu’au: This thesis is confidential until DD-MM-YYYY
Cette thèse est sous embargo jusqu’au JJ: This thesis is under embargo until DD-MM-YYYY
Informatique, information, généralités: Data processing, information science, general collection
Histoire et géographie du christianisme: History of Christianity and Christian church
Photographie et les photographies, art n: Photography and photographs and computer art
Littérature de langues romanes. Littérat: Literatures of Romance languages. French literature
Histoire ancienne et préhistoire: History of ancient world and prehistory
Histoire moderne et contemporaine de l'E: Modern and ancient history of Europe
Histoire générale de l'Asie, Orient, Ext: General history of Asia, Orient, Far East
Histoire générale des autres parties du: General history of other parts of world, of extraterrestrial worlds, of Pacific Ocean Islangds
